text: hi everyone I'm Emily and our dairy parlor here at Farm Park and this is my friend caramel caramel is one of our dairy cows here specifically she's a milking short horn and her job on the farm is to make milk for us now before caramel can make any milk she has to eat a lot of food as you can see she's a really big animal she weighs around 1,300 pounds or so her diet consists of hay grass and grain all together she's gonna eat around 100 pounds of food every single day and she's going to drink about 30 to 40 gallons of water every day so she needs all that food and water to make some for us but she will only make milk if she's a girl and she's a mom so when we say the word wow that's actually what we mean a girl that's a mom now caramel had her last calf in February or her last baby so she's making a lot of milk for us right now and she keeps me right here on her udder now we can either get that milk out facing our hands or right using the machine now I'm going to show you how to use our pants so the first thing we do is we want to put some teeth dip on her this is basically just a sanitizer for the cow after that sits on there for a little bit we can go ahead and wipe it off so the way we milk is we take our pointer finger and our thumb we wrap it right around the base of her udder where it meets her teeth squeeze those together and then just squeeze our fingers around a lot of people think that you have to pull down to get the milk out but actually we just squeeze our hand around almost like a fist that sound you hear right now is our milk machine rather than trying to handle our cows twice a day every day and suddenly use our milk machine it's a lot faster and a lot easier so before we put the machine on it what we want to do is get a little bit of milk out of each section up for other so on the inside for utter is divided up into four different sections we just hand over to make sure that her mouth looks alright and that her udder feels okay after that we put some pizzas on each one of her teeth and we leave that on for at least 30 seconds make sure sure we kill any germs or bacteria so after it's been 30 seconds we can go ahead and wipe it keep it off each seat then we can take our milk machine we call this piece the claw we flip it over and once we push in this button it turns on our suction and that's what's gonna suck the milk out of the cab [Music] [Music]
